articles.title: USC outlasts UCLA in thriller, headed for Pac-12 title game - ESPN
articles.description: One year after a blowout loss to UCLA, USC outlasted its rival in a 48-45 thriller that punched the Trojans' ticket to the Pac-12 championship in Year 1 of the Lincoln Riley era.
articles.content: PASADENA, Calif. -- All season long, USC coach Lincoln Riley has made it a point -- after a win, a loss, a practice -- to mention where the team was just a year ago as compared with where it is now.… [+5207 chars]
